name: Knockout!!! A game by RobotBand
description:
Knockout!!! A game by RobotBand

You play as Joe Average, a nobody who wants to prove his worth. After stumbling into a boxing ring and knocking out his opponent, (completely by accident) he gets hired as a full - time boxer. This is where your journey begins.

Fight boxers such as Dally McShotgun, a hunter from Texas, Aloha Hula, a dancer with a dream, and Toro De Fuego, a Mexican superstar. 

NOTE: THIS GAME IS A DEMO, AND IS IN NO WAY FINISHED
